com.psddev.dari.util
Class DebugFilter

java.lang.Object
  com.psddev.dari.util.AbstractFilter
      com.psddev.dari.util.DebugFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter
public class DebugFilter
extends AbstractFilter

Provides debugging tools for troubleshooting the application.

This filter loads:

  • SettingsOverrideFilter
  • SourceFilter
  • LogCaptureFilter
  • ResourceFilter

                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,

Description copied from class: AbstractFilter
Triggers when this filter needs to process a page. This method will delegate to one of: AbstractFilter.doError(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.FilterChain), AbstractFilter.doInclude(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.FilterChain), AbstractFilter.doForward(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.FilterChain), or AbstractFilter.doRequest(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse, javax.servlet.FilterChain).
